summary: Foo Fighters are an American rock band from Seattle, formed in 1994 by Dave Grohl, ex-drummer of Nirvana. Originally a solo project, it grew into a full band. Their debut album was recorded by Grohl alone in six days. The band has had several lineup changes over the years, with Grohl as the constant member. They've released 11 albums, won 15 Grammys, and were inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2021. Their latest album, "But Here We Are," was released in 2023.
title: Foo Fighters
